Body: My university redirects me to a https login page when accessing internet through wifi. This is irritating when trying to connect to the Internet from my Android phone. I was wondering whether there is some application to do logging in whenever that application is opened (storing credentials, of course)? If not, how can I create such an application? Is there any previous application created (with open source code) that is customized for automating logging into certain networks?
Title: Auto login to wifi networks

Is there any previous application created (with open source code) that is customized for automating logging into certain networks.
Writing Android app to auto login to wifi networks
